mods.abstract: One color window card (red on white) announcing Lotsa Cool Bands featuring Deep Voodoo, Tribal Assault, Surfing the Coaldust, The Vacancy, The Fun Girls From Mt. Pilot, The Phantom Five, and Teen Idols at the Centennial Park Band Shell in Nashville, Tennessee on October 14. Poster features a woodcut of a person smiling and waving.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
